```{r}
library(ggplot2)

now <- format(Sys.time(), "%A, %Y-%m-%d -- %H:%M:%S %Z")

message(paste0("Can you believe it's ", now, "?"))

ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.2) +
  labs(title = "Diamond Something Something") +
  theme("minimal")
```
